fulltext:
 EXPERIENCE
ANT FINANCIAL
JUL 2018 - NOW
Site Reliability Engineer
- Take shifts on duty of monitoring.
- Controlling the downtime of payment service of one of biggest e-commerce website.
- Understanding the payment method such as credit card, online banking, over the
counter, virtual account, payment account and the payment flow. 
- Monitoring business metrics for over 50 payment channels of 10 countries.
- Create and optimize alerts for payment channels. 
- Take relationship with banks and co-operate with them when the issue happen.
- Developing Hive/SQL queries for querying data and alert by hours and days.
- Building monitoring tools to detect the incidents as soon as possible. 
Result:
- Improve the success rate of transactions in Thailand 8% and Vietnam 3% compared to
the start time.
- Uptime of payment service per countries is always above 99,9%
- Able to find out the issue that no one able to detect. 
KYANON DIGITAL
NOV 2017 - JUN 2018
DevOps Engineer
- Working in different OS environments such as Window Server 2008, 2012 and 2016,
CentOS 6,7 and Ubuntu.
- Maintaining, fixing , and optimizing the existing system.
- Building ITSM workflow.
- Support different project's types such as PHP Framework, Python Framework and
NodeJS.
- Building CI System with Jenkins: automatic building and deploying to server for every
commit in source control. 
- Integrating the code review system with SonarQube.
- Improving working performance by building scripts and using tools .
FLIX VIET - HDVIET - HDONLINE
FEB 2017 - NOV 2017
Senior System Engineer
- Deploy and maintain OpenStack (3 months).
- Configure and build Storage server: Ceph cluster – 20 servers for film storage and
OpenStack storage.
- Deploy and maintain the Transcode system and integrating it with OpenStack. 
- Working with Wowza service – a software converting analog signal to digital.
- Streaming system: tuning server not only software but also hardware for 15GB/s
throughput per server.
- Troubleshooting website's issues and security problem.
VNG CORPORATION
SEP 2015 - FEB 2017
Associate System Engineer
- Maintain different games with over 200 servers and different environments: CentOS
6.x, Window Server 2008.
- Scripting for monitoring, operating system and backing up log.
- Updating and improving system component for better operation. 
BARON TRAN
DevOps Engineer - Senior System
Engineer
 27/09/1993
 Male
(+84)93 889 3593
 tqviet.hcmus@gmail.com
District 8, Ho Chi Minh City
 fb.com/viet.hcmus
OBJECTIVE
Play 3 roles System Engineer,
DevOps Engineer and Site Reliability
Engineer.
Bring the stable, efficiency, security
and availability of not only business
value but also the technical system.
SKILLS
System Operation (Linux, Window)
Database Administrator
Security
Programming - Bash, Python
Logical Thinking
Fast Learning
Researching
Adaptive
INTERESTS
Swimming
Jogging
Travelling
Motorbike
- On call 24/7 and weekends for all system's issues.
- Apply new technologies such as Docker, Rancher, Kubernetes to reduce the cost of
server per month.

 EDUCATION
UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCES
SEP 2011 - SEP 2015
Computer Science and Networking
Thesis : Pentest Automation System
 REFERENCES
Lê Quốc Anh Tuấn - Kyanon Digital
Technical Lead - 0907621629
Hồ Huy Hoàng - Flix Viet
Leader of System Engineer Team - 0985560860
Phan Anh Tuấn - VNG
Leader of System Engineer Team - 0908212293

experiences.detail:
- Take shifts on duty of monitoring.
- Controlling the downtime of payment service of one of biggest e-commerce website.
- Understanding the payment method such as credit card, online banking, over the counter, virtual account, payment account and the payment flow.
- Monitoring business metrics for over 50 payment channels of 10 countries.
- Create and optimize alerts for payment channels.
- Take relationship with banks and co-operate with them when the issue happen.
- Developing Hive/SQL queries for querying data and alert by hours and days.
- Building monitoring tools to detect the incidents as soon as possible.
Result: - Improve the success rate of transactions in Thailand 8% and Vietnam 3% compared to the start time.
- Uptime of payment service per countries is always above 99,9% - Able to find out the issue that no one able to detect.

- Working in different OS environments such as Window Server 2008, 2012 and 2016, CentOS 6,7 and Ubuntu. - Maintaining, fixing , and optimizing the existing system.
- Building ITSM workflow.
- Support different project's types such as PHP Framework, Python Framework and
NodeJS. - Building CI System with Jenkins: automatic building and deploying to server for every commit in source control.

- Deploy and maintain OpenStack (3 months).
- Configure and build Storage server: Ceph cluster - 20 servers for film storage and

- Streaming system: tuning server not only software but also hardware for 15GB/s throughput per server.
- Troubleshooting website's issues and security problem.

- Maintain different games with over 200 servers and different environments: CentOS 6.x, Window Server 2008. - Scripting for monitoring, operating system and backing up log.

- On call 24/7 and weekends for all system's issues.
